ThingDef.Name: PCA_Melee_PoweredSpear_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona powered spear
ThingDef.description: A highly-advanced spear. Inspired by the spears carried by the ancient Immortal guard of the Achaemenid Empire, they are commonly used by the imperial elite heavy infantry of the same name. The blade is coated in a field of ionized plasma, helping it cut through enemy armor.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PCA_Gun_500SWTactical_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona 500 S&W Magnum Tactical
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern double-action revolver. Fires one of the most powerful pistol cartridges ever made. Comes equipped with reflex sights.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PCA_Gun_SWMPTactical_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona S&W M&P 5.7 Tactical
ThingDef.description: A lightweight pistol that utilizes specialized rounds to eliminate lightly armored opponents. Comes equipped with reflex sights and a suppressor.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Comes equipped with an advanced scope and a suppressor.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PCA_Gun_RM338Tactical_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona RM338 Tactical
ThingDef.description: Ancient lightweight medium machine gun. The RM338 is designed to bridge the gap between light machine gun and heavy machine gun calibers making use of a bigger cartridge while being lighter than other machine gun designs. Features a recoil mitigation system and comes equipped with an advanced scope and a suppressor.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PCA_Gun_SRSTactical_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona SRS-M2 Tactical
ThingDef.description: Ancient bolt-action sniper rifle in bullpup design. Combines a powerful cartridge with an advanced high-magnification scope for sniping at long range. Comes equipped with a suppressor.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PCA_Gun_JaguarTactical_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona GM20 Jaguar Tactical

Features a recoil mitigation system and comes equipped with a suppressor and vertical foregrip.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PCA_Gun_HandheldVektorTactical_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Handheld Vektor GA-1 autocannon Tactical
ThingDef.description: Ancient autocannon in portable configuration for use against armored targets. Features a shorter than average barrel for better portability, features a recoil mitigation system and comes comes equipped with a suppressor and laser sights. Due to the use of plasteel in its manufacturing, it is a relatively light weapon.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
